short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warns you when you are connected to production. Never accidentally make changes to production.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prod Guard lets you add bright red warnings to your productions website. With this you can make changes in your development environment without fear of accidentally making those changes in production.

Warnings use regular expressions to match on website URLs. This allows for very simple matches (host only) or more complex ones (host, port, path, etc.).
